w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach basic travel words by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases:
puzzle, stuffed animal, go to bed, solve the puzzle, play with the stuffed animal, clean your room
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for toys.
Spell and pronounce common associated words and commands.
Use sets of words in complete sentences.
This slide will always be the
-branded opener slide that the teacher will display as the student enters the classroom.

Word Wall Vocabulary Builder Activity – Slide Number 22

puzzle, stuffed animal, go to bed, solve the puzzle, play with the stuffed animal, clean your room
· Teacher will give feedback on the spelling and pronunciation of the new words.
